Podcasts

Need something to listen to on a long car ride? Stuck in an airplane for a few hours? Try a podcast or two.

Syntax.fm

Visit

Syntax is a podcast done by Wes Bos and Scott Tolinsky, providing a lot of good insights (or Tasty Treats as they like to call it) about the web development industry. Both of them are backed by years of experience and a wealth of knowledge.
